word:
"THEY REGARD THE USE OF THEIR PROPERTY WORTH THE SAME AS MONEY AT 10 PERCENT. THIS 10 PERCENT THEY REGARD AS 
                                                                           523
THE INCREASE OF THEIR PROPERTY. A TITHE OF THIS WOULD BE 1 PERCENT, AND WOULD BE NEARLY 2 CENTS PER WEEK ON EACH $100, WHICH OUR BRETHREN, FOR CONVENIENCE SAKE, ARE UNANIMOUS IN PUTTING DOWN."
